description: Using red curry paste helps speed up this recipe. You'll have a colourful, fragrant meal on the table in less than 30 minutes.
keywords: Red curry,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Barramundi,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Rice,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Red Curry Barramundi with Bok Choy Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g skinless barramundi fillet, cut into 3cm pieces
100g snow peas, trimmed, cut into strips lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat. Add curry paste and heat until fragrant. Stir in coconut milk and bring to a gentle simmer. Add sugar, fish sauce, lime leaves and barramundi pieces and cook for 2 minutes.
Add snow peas and bok choy. Cover pan and cook for 5 minutes. Remove lid and stir gently to combine, so as not to break up the fish. Stir in coriander.
Ladle into bowls and serve with rice, lime wedges and extra coriander.
